Package utils

Class Conversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Conversions
  • public class Conversions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a number of static methods to calculate new information from a Reading, converting values to other formats or standards.
    Author:
    Dermot O'Riordan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Conversions()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static double tempToF​(double temperature)
      Converts the current temperature reading from Celcius to Fahrenheit.
      static java.lang.String weatherCodeToString​(int code)
      Returns a String with a in words of the latest weather conditions formatted to be displayed on the Latest Readings summary cards.
      static java.lang.String weatherIconFromCode​(int code)
      Returns a String with the Fomatic UI code to generate an appropriate icon for the Latest Readings summary cards.
      static double windChillCalc​(double windSpeed, double temperature)
      Calculates the wind chill factor ("feels like") using the current wind speed and temperature readings.
      static java.lang.String windDirectionToString​(int windDirection)
      This method accepts a value for the direction of the wind in degrees and returns a String of words describing the wind direction.
      static int windToBft​(double windSpeed)
      This method accepts a value for the speed of the wind in Km/h (double) and returns an int with the speed in the Beaufort Scale (Bft).

    • Method Detail

      • weatherCodeToString

        public static java.lang.String weatherCodeToString​(int code)
        Returns a String with a in words of the latest weather conditions formatted to be displayed on the Latest Readings summary cards.
        Parameters:
        code - The numerical code for the latest weather conditions.
        Returns:
        A String with a description in words of the latest weather conditions.

      • tempToF

        public static double tempToF​(double temperature)
        Converts the current temperature reading from Celcius to Fahrenheit.
        Parameters:
        temperature - The temperature in degrees Celcius.
        Returns:
        The temperature in degrees Fahrenheit.

      • windChillCalc

        public static double windChillCalc​(double windSpeed,
                                   double temperature)
        Calculates the wind chill factor ("feels like") using the current wind speed and temperature readings.
        Parameters:
        windSpeed - The speed of the wind in Km/h.
        temperature - The current air temperature in degrees Celcius.
        Returns:
        The current wind chill factor in degrees Celcius.

      • windToBft

        public static int windToBft​(double windSpeed)
        This method accepts a value for the speed of the wind in Km/h (double) and returns an int with the speed in the Beaufort Scale (Bft).
        Parameters:
        windSpeed - The speed at which the wind is blowing.
        Returns:
        The wind speed on the Beaufort Scale (Bft).

      • windDirectionToString

        public static java.lang.String windDirectionToString​(int windDirection)
        This method accepts a value for the direction of the wind in degrees and returns a String of words describing the wind direction.
        Parameters:
        windDirection - The direction in degrees (int, 0-360) the wind is blowing.
        Returns:
        A String with the wind direction in words.

      • weatherIconFromCode

        public static java.lang.String weatherIconFromCode​(int code)
        Returns a String with the Fomatic UI code to generate an appropriate icon for the Latest Readings summary cards.
        Parameters:
        code - The numerical code for the latest weather conditions.
        Returns:
        A String with the correct Fomatic syntax to generate a weather icon.
